name: Edward WILLIAMS v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD; Crowley Frozen Desserts. Petition of CROWLEY FROZEN DESSERTS
name_abbreviation: Williams v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board
docket_number: Petition No. 660 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1996

parties: Edward WILLIAMS v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD; Crowley Frozen Desserts. Petition of CROWLEY FROZEN DESSERTS.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW this 20th day of April, 1998, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted and the order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed. See Udvari v. Workmen’s Compensation Appeal Board (USAir, Inc.), 705 A.2d 1290 (Pa. 1997). The Request for Supersedeas is denied as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
709 A.2d 899
Edward WILLIAMS v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD; Crowley Frozen Desserts. Petition of CROWLEY FROZEN DESSERTS.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 20, 1998.
